text: “Ndipo ngati mwalekana nawo (akaziwo) musanakhudzane nawo mutawadziwitsa gawo la chiwongo chawo, apatseni theka la chimene mudagwirizana kuwapatsa pokhapokha ngati akaziwo atakana okha (theka la chiwongocho), kapena (mwamuna) uja yemwe kumangitsa kwa ukwati kuli m’manja mwake amusiire (chiwongo chonsecho mkaziyo). Ndipo ngati mutasiirana (zimenezo) zingakuyandikitseni kumbali yoopa Allah. Ndipo musaiwale kuchitirana zabwino pakati panu (ngakhale kuti mukulekana). Ndithudi Allah akuona zonse zimene mukuchita
